languages.text: "Твои приговоры не имеют ничего общего со сводами правосудия Империума. Ты творишь самоуправство, создаешь свой закон, а значит... свой Империум! Это — ересь!"
"Your verdicts bear no relation to the codified justice of the Imperium. Your justice is arbitrary and you are creating your own law — in essence... your own Imperium! That is heresy!"
languages.original_text: "Твои приговоры не имеют ничего общего со сводами правосудия Империума. Ты творишь самоуправство, создаешь свой закон, а значит... свой Империум! Это — ересь!"

traits.locale_text: "Your verdicts bear no relation to the codified justice of the Imperium. You are using your power at your own discretion. You make your own laws. Which is tantamount to... building your own Imperium! And that is heresy!"

"Your verdicts bear no relation to the codified justice of the Imperium. You are using your power at your own discretion. You make your own laws. Which is tantamount to... building your own Imperium! And that is heresy!"
"Your verdicts bear no relation to the codified justice of the Imperium. You create arbitrariness, create your own law, which means... Your own Imperium! That is heresy!"
"Your verdicts bear no relation to the codified justice of the Imperium. You create arbitrariness, create your own law, which means... Your own Imperium! That is heresy!"
"Your verdicts bear no relation to the codified justice of the Imperium. Your justice is arbitrary and you are creating your own law — in essence... your own Imperium! That is heresy!"
"Your verdicts bear no relation to the codified justice of the Imperium. Your justice is arbitrary and you are creating your own law — in essence... your own Imperium! That is heresy!"

languages.text: “你的判决与帝国法典已经没有任何关系了。你所谓的正义不过是恣意妄为，你自行制订法律，换句话说……你把这里当成了你的自己的帝国！这是异端恶行！”
languages.original_text: "Your verdicts bear no relation to the codified justice of the Imperium. Your justice is arbitrary and you are creating your own law — in essence... your own Imperium! That is heresy!"

traits.locale_text: “你的判决与帝国的法典已经没有任何关系了。你任意妄为，自行规定法律，这意味着……你把这里当成了你的自己的帝国！这是异端恶行！”

languages.text: 「お前の判断は、法で定められた帝国の正義と何の関係もない。お前の正義は一方的で、独自の法律を作り出している。突き詰めてしまえば…己の帝国を作ろうとしているのだ！異端に他ならない！」
languages.original_text: "Your verdicts bear no relation to the codified justice of the Imperium. Your justice is arbitrary and you are creating your own law — in essence... your own Imperium! That is heresy!"

traits.locale_text: 「お前の判断は、法で定められた帝国の正義と何の関係もない。お前の正義は一方的で、独自の法律を作り出している。突き詰めてしまえば…己の帝国を作ろうとしているのだ！異端に他ならない！」

languages.text: «Sus veredictos no guardan relación con la justicia codificada del Imperium. Está creando su propia ley a través de sus veredictos arbitrarios, lo que resulta prácticamente en... ¡su propio Imperium! ¡Eso es herejía!».
languages.original_text: "Your verdicts bear no relation to the codified justice of the Imperium. Your justice is arbitrary and you are creating your own law — in essence... your own Imperium! That is heresy!"

traits.locale_text: «Sus veredictos no guardan relación con la justicia codificada del Imperium. Crea arbitrariedad y su propia ley, lo que significa... ¡Su propio Imperium! ¡Eso es herejía!».

languages.text: "Eure Urteile stehen in keinerlei Zusammenhang mit der kodifizierten Gerechtigkeit des Imperiums. Eure Gerechtigkeit ist willkürlich und Ihr schafft Eure eigenen Gesetze ... nein ... Euer eigenes Imperium! Das ist Ketzerei!"
languages.original_text: "Your verdicts bear no relation to the codified justice of the Imperium. Your justice is arbitrary and you are creating your own law — in essence... your own Imperium! That is heresy!"

traits.locale_text: "Eure Urteile stehen in keinerlei Zusammenhang mit der kodifizierten Gerechtigkeit des Imperiums. Ihr erzeugt Willkür, erzeugt Euer eigenes Gesetz, und das bedeutet ... Euer eigenes Imperium! Das ist Ketzerei!"

languages.text: « Vos verdicts n'ont rien à voir avec le code de justice de l'Imperium. Vos sentences sont arbitraires et vous arrangez les lois à votre guise... En somme, vous tentez de créer votre propre Imperium, et ça, c'est de l'hérésie ! »
languages.original_text: "Your verdicts bear no relation to the codified justice of the Imperium. Your justice is arbitrary and you are creating your own law — in essence... your own Imperium! That is heresy!"

traits.locale_text: « Vos verdicts n'ont rien à voir avec le code de justice de l'Imperium. Vous appliquez des sentences arbitraires et arrangez les lois à votre guise... En somme, vous tentez de créer votre propre Imperium, et ça, c'est de l'hérésie ! »

languages.text: "Verdiğin cezaların, İmparatorluk'un kodlanmış adaletiyle hiçbir alakası yok. Son derece muğlak bir adalet anlayışın var ve kendi kanunlarını yaratıyorsun. Yani özünde kendi... İmparatorluk'unu yaratıyorsun! Bu kâfirliktir!"
languages.original_text: "Your verdicts bear no relation to the codified justice of the Imperium. Your justice is arbitrary and you are creating your own law — in essence... your own Imperium! That is heresy!"

traits.locale_text: "Verdiğin cezaların, İmparatorluk'un kodlanmış adaletiyle herhangi bir ilişkisi yok. Son derece muğlak bir adalet anlayışın var ve kendi kanunlarını yaratıyorsun. Yani özünde kendi... İmparatorluk'unu yaratıyorsun! Bu kâfirliktir!"
